title: Somebody Else
description:
From the author of bestselling novels 5 YEARS LATER & LET YOU GO comes the heart wrenching, bestselling story about a couple who lost the unthinkable... and then lost each other. With a chance encounter, the spark they once lost is still there... but what if it's too late for them?
He was the one I loved.I was the one who walked away.We both know why.I was never supposed to see him again.*What I have now looks perfect on the outside.The car. The career. The house. The neighbor-slash-best-friend. The handsome man holding my hand.We can talk about everything. Except the past.That's good enough to get by.*When Brice comes crashing back into my life, it's not fate, it's torture.My quiet, simple, perfect life is exposed, just like my still-healing heart.I don't intend to hurt anyone.Â But with two hearts demanding my love, I have no choice.
author: Jaxson Kidman
